name: BCP_lp_user
brief: User customization interface for LP process

algorithms.name:
LP User Hooks: Cuts, Branching, Feasibility, Heuristics

BCP_lp_user is the main interface for user-defined LP behavior.
Most BCP customization happens here.

**Initialization:**
- initialize_solver_interface(): Create OsiSolverInterface
- initialize_int_and_sos_list(): Define branching objects
- initialize_new_search_tree_node(): Preprocess before node
- load_problem(): Load problem into solver

**LP iteration:**
- process_lp_result(): Main iteration callback (or use individual)
- test_feasibility(): Check if solution is integer-feasible
- generate_heuristic_solution(): Run primal heuristics
- compute_lower_bound(): True lower bound for column generation

**Cut/variable generation:**
- generate_cuts_in_lp(): Local cut generation
- generate_vars_in_lp(): Local column generation (pricing)
- cuts_to_rows(): Convert BCP_cut to matrix rows
- vars_to_cols(): Convert BCP_var to matrix columns

**Branching:**
- select_branching_candidates(): Choose branching objects
- compare_branching_candidates(): Select best candidate
- set_actions_for_children(): Fathom/Return/Keep decisions

**Packing:**
- pack_primal_solution(): Send LP solution to CG
- pack_dual_solution(): Send duals to VG
- pack_feasible_solution(): Send solution to TM

see: BCP_tm_user for Tree Manager user interface
